targets.rawSql:
SELECT mm.eventid, me.title
  , sm.marketid, mm.description
  , a.selectionid, sm.description
  --, a.timestamp
  --, a.prevprice
  , a.currentprice
  --, a.pricediff
FROM active_selections AS a
  INNER JOIN selection_master_data AS sm ON a.selectionid = sm.selectionid
  INNER JOIN market_master_data AS mm ON sm.marketid = mm.marketid
  LEFT JOIN event_master_data AS me ON mm.eventid = me.eventid
ORDER BY eventid, marketid, selectionid

SELECT b.betid, b.betstamp, 
       b.initialprice AS totalBetPrice, 
       b.cashoutprice,
       r.active_bet_price AS activePrice,
       b.selections, 
       me.eventid || ': ' || COALESCE(me.title, '?') as event,
       mm.marketid || ': ' || COALESCE(mm.description, '?') as market, 
       bs.selectionid || ': ' || COALESCE(sm.description, '?') as selection, 
       --a.timestamp, 
       sd.active,
       bs.price AS oddPrice,
       sd.prevprice, sd.currentprice, sd.pricediff as delta, sd.currentprice - bs.price AS diffPrice
FROM bets AS b
  INNER JOIN
    (
      SELECT  b.betid
              --, EXP(b.logcashoutprice) as target_bet_price
              , EXP(SUM(sd.logcurrentprice)) as active_bet_price 
              --, COUNT(bs.selectionid) as total_bet_selections
              --, COUNT(CASE WHEN a.isactive THEN 1 END) AS active_bet_selections
      FROM bets AS b
          INNER JOIN bet_selections AS bs ON b.betid = bs.betid
          LEFT JOIN active_selections AS a ON bs.selectionid = a.selectionid
          LEFT JOIN selection_data AS sd ON a.selectionid = sd.selectionid AND a.timestamp = sd.timestamp
      GROUP BY b.betid
      HAVING COUNT(bs.selectionid) = COUNT(CASE WHEN sd.active THEN 1 END)
             AND SUM(sd.logcurrentprice) < b.logcashoutprice
    ) AS r ON b.betid = r.betid
  INNER JOIN bet_selections AS bs ON b.betid = bs.betid
  LEFT JOIN active_selections AS a ON bs.selectionid = a.selectionid
  LEFT JOIN selection_data AS sd ON a.selectionid = sd.selectionid AND a.timestamp = sd.timestamp
  LEFT JOIN selection_master_data AS sm ON a.selectionid = sm.selectionid
  LEFT JOIN market_master_data AS mm ON sm.marketid = mm.marketid
  LEFT JOIN event_master_data AS me ON mm.eventid = me.eventid
ORDER BY b.betid
